function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Health risks and interruptions to construction and transportation projects","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict health and safety measures, vaccination programs, and social distancing protocols","Technologies":"Digital health monitoring systems, contactless technologies, and online collaboration platforms","People":"Field workers, project managers, construction workers","Owner":"Government authorities, project managers, construction companies"},{"Description":"Interrupted supply chain and staff shortages","Impact":"Project delays and disruptions in the construction and transportation sector","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply sources, inventory management, and retention of skilled staff","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, remote monitoring systems, and workforce management tools","People":"Supply chain managers, project managers, staff supervisors","Owner":"Supply chain managers, project managers, construction companies"},{"Description":"Lower wages and reduced availability of transportation services","Impact":"Impact on worker livelihoods and project timelines","Mitigation":"Financial relief programs, provision of alternative transportation, and support for remote work","Technologies":"Online payment systems, remote work technologies, and employee assistance programs","People":"Field workers, project managers, transportation staff","Owner":"Government authorities, employers, transportation companies"}]}
